$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/readme.text:
!!''~TiddlyTables'' is a plugin for ~TiddlyWiki to create advanced sortable tables. Put simply, a filter is used to return a list of titles, or ''rows''. and a list of field names determines what ''columns'' to display. The best way to explore the many features of ~TiddlyTables is to create a new table and start editing. #''Install'' - Drag this link into your ~TiddlyWiki: [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables]] #''Create'' - There are two ways to create a ~TiddlyTable. ##Use the //New Table// ''Button'' in the ''Page Toolbar'':

{{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/button/image}}

##Manual method ###Add ''``<>``'' to the text field of a new or existing tiddler. ###Save tiddler. A button is rendered on the tiddler. ###Click ''Reset Table'' button. This creates the required ''tbl'' fields and renders the table. #''Edit'' - There are two ways to edit the table. ##Graphically (recommended) - Click the ''Edit'' Button above the table. ##Manually - Edit the tiddler and modify ''tbl'' fields. #''Customize'' - ~TiddlyTables are highly customizable. ##Modify ''Defaults'' - [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults]] ##''Style'' Templates (CSS) - prefix $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/style/ ###Tagged $:/tags/Stylesheet (required) ###Field tbl-class-name (required) ###Default setting - tbl-class field ##''Column'' Templates - determine how columns are rendered. ###''Tag'' these templates with ''column'' names to modify how a column's cells render. ###Each column has three template types, or ''cell types''. They are: ####''Header'' - prefix $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/header... #####Tagged $:/tags/table/HeaderTemplate (required) #####Default setting - tbl-temp-default-header field ####''Body'' - prefix $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body... #####Tagged $:/tags/table/BodyTemplate (required) #####Default setting - tbl-temp-default-body field ####''Footer'' - prefix $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/footer... #####Tagged $:/tags/table/FooterTemplate (required) #####Default setting - tbl-temp-default-footer field ###If no templates of a particular type contain the column name as a tag, the default template for that type is used. ###New templates can be created or cloned from an existing one. ##''Expand'' Templates - prefix $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/expand... ###Tagged $:/tags/table/ExpandTemplate (required) ###Default setting - tbl-temp-default-expand field ##''Pagination'' Template - $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/pagination/default ###No mechanism to change on per-table basis. No tag required. ###No default setting ###To modify, edit the default pagination template.
$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/readme.title: $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/readme

$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults.text:
''all'' of a fundamental category: [all[tiddlers+shadows+tags+orphans+missing+current]]
''backlinks'' to input: [backlinks[]]
''contains'' - list field //contains// value ``!``: [contains:list[ENTER VALUE HERE]]
''days'' in past/future ``!``: [days:modified[ENTER + OR - NUMBER OF DAYS HERE]]
''field'' has value ``!``: [field:title[ENTER VALUE HERE]]
''fields'' of input: [fields[]]
''get'' value of field: [get[ENTER FIELD HERE]]
''getindex'' value of property: [getindex[ENTER PROPERTY HERE]]
''has'' field ``!``: [has[ENTER FIELD HERE]]
''indexes'' of input: [indexes[]]
''is'' a fundamental category ``!``: [is[current OR image OR missing OR orphan OR shadow OR tag OR tiddler OR variable OR blank]]
''links'' of input: [links[]]
''list'' titles of list field ``!``: [list[ENTER TIDDLER!!FIELD REFERENCE HERE]]
''listed'' on field of input: [listed[ENTER OPTIONAL FIELD HERE]]
''prefix'' on input titles ``!``: [prefix[ENTER TITLE PREFIX HERE]]
''range'' of numbers ``!``: [range[1, 25, 5]]
''regexp'' pattern ``!``: [regexp[ENTER REG EXP HERE]]
''reverse'' order of input: [reverse[]]
''sameday'' as field: [sameday:modified[ENTER YYYYMMDD HERE]]
''search'' ``!``: [search:tags, text, title:literal,whitespace,regexp,words,casesensitive,anchored[ENTER SEARCH TEXT HERE]]
''subfilter'' ``!``: [subfilter<ENTER VARIABLE OR REFERENCE HERE>]
''suffix'' on input titles ``!``: [suffix[ENTER TITLE SUFFIX HERE]]
''tag'' found on input ``!``: [tag[ENTER TAG NAME HERE]]
''tagging'' matches input: [tagging[]]
''tags'' of input: [tags[]]
''untagged'' titles of input ``!``: [untagged[]]

$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/macro.text:
\define table()
<$reveal type="match" state="!!tbl-columns" text="">
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" >{{$:/core/images/refresh-button}} Reset Table<$action-setfield 
tbl-add-records={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-add-records}}
tbl-anything={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-anything}}
tbl-button-actions={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-button-actions}}
tbl-button-icon={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-button-icon}}
tbl-caption={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-caption}}
tbl-checkbox-actions-selected={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-checkbox-actions-selected}}
tbl-checkbox-actions-unselected={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-checkbox-actions-unselected}}
tbl-checkbox-field={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-checkbox-field}}
tbl-checkbox-value-selected={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-checkbox-value-selected}}
tbl-checkbox-tag={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-checkbox-tag}}
tbl-checkbox-value-unselected={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-checkbox-value-unselected}}
tbl-class={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-class}}
tbl-columns={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-columns}}
tbl-expand={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-expand}}
tbl-filter={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-filter}}
tbl-show-caption={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-show-caption}}
tbl-show-colgroup={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-show-colgroup}}
tbl-show-edit={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-show-edit}}
tbl-show-footer={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-show-footer}}
tbl-show-header={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-show-header}}
tbl-show-pagination={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-show-pagination}}
tbl-limit={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-limit}}
tbl-page-marker={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-page-marker}}
tbl-sort-by={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-sort-by}}
tbl-sort-negate={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-sort-negate}}
tbl-sort-type={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-sort-type}}
tbl-style-colgroup={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-style-colgroup}}
tbl-style-container={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-style-container}}
tbl-style-table={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-style-table}}/>
</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="!!tbl-columns" text="" tag="div" style={{!!tbl-style-container}} class={{!!tbl-class}}>
<$vars buttonAction={{!!tbl-button-actions}} buttonIcon={{!!tbl-button-icon}} anythingCode={{!!tbl-anything}} pageMarker={{!!tbl-page-marker}} currentTable={{!!title}} enteredFilter={{!!tbl-filter}} enteredTitles={{!!tbl-add-records}} recordLimit={{!!tbl-limit}} sortBy={{!!tbl-sort-by}} sortType={{!!tbl-sort-type}} checkTag={{!!tbl-checkbox-tag}} checkSel={{!!tbl-checkbox-value-selected}} checkUnsel={{!!tbl-checkbox-value-unselected}} checkActions={{!!tbl-checkbox-actions-selected}} checkUnactions={{!!tbl-checkbox-actions-unselected}} >
<$set name="tableExpand" filter="[<currentTable>get[tbl-expand]]" emptyValue={{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-temp-default-expand}} value={{!!tbl-expand}}>
<$set name="checkField" filter="[<currentTable>get[tbl-checkbox-field]]" emptyValue="modified" value={{!!tbl-checkbox-field}}>
<$set name="sortNeg" filter="[<currentTable>field:tbl-sort-negate[true]]" emptyValue="" value="!">
<$set name="pageFilter" filter=<<nextFirst>>  emptyValue="+[allafter{!!tbl-page-marker}]+[{!!tbl-page-marker}]" value="+[allafter:including{!!tbl-page-marker}]" >
<$set name="includePage" filter="[<currentTable>get[tbl-page-marker]]"  emptyValue="" value=<<pageFilter>> >
{{||$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/editor/open}}
{{||$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/view}}
{{||$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/pagination}}
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$set>
</$vars>
</$reveal>
\end

\define inputFilter()
$(enteredFilter)$[list[$(currentTable)$!!tbl-add-records]]
\end

\define resetPagination()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]+[first[]]
\end

\define veryFirst()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortType)$[$(currentColumn)$]]+[first[]]
\end

\define veryLast()
$(inputFilter)$+[!$(sortType)$[title]$(sortType)$[$(currentColumn)$]]+[last[]]
\end

\define previousFirst()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]+[allbefore[$(pageMarker)$]]+[last[$(recordLimit)$]]+[first[]]
\end

\define nextFirst()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]+[allafter[$(pageMarker)$]]+[limit[$(recordLimit)$]]+[last[]]
\end

\define lastRec()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]+[allafter:including[$(pageMarker)$]]+[limit[$(recordLimit)$]]+[last[]]
\end

\define getFirst()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]+[allbefore[$(pageMarker)$]]+[prepend[1]]
\end

\define getLast()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]+[allbefore:including[$(lastRecord)$]]
\end

\define tableFilter()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]$(includePage)$+[limit[$(recordLimit)$]]
\end

\define showDeleteConfirm()
$(tableFilter)$+[limit[1]]
\end

\define checkboxFilter()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]$(sortNeg)$$(sortType)$[$(sortBy)$]]$(includePage)$+[limit[$(recordLimit)$]!tag[$(checkTag)$]!field:$(checkField)$[$(checkSel)$]]
\end

\define overLimit()
$(inputFilter)$+[limit[$(recordLimit)$]]+[nth[$(totalCount)$]][[$(currentTable)$]get[tbl-show-pagination]]+[remove[auto]reverse[]][range[$(filteredCount)$]]+[butlast[$(totalCount)$]]
\end

\define tempTable()
$:/temp/tables/$(currentTable)$
\end

\define tempTableExpand()
$:/temp/tables/expand/$(currentTable)$
\end

\define tempTableStyle()
$:/temp/tables/style/$(currentTable)$
\end

\define tempTagPopup()
$(tempTable)$/$(currentRecord)$/$(currentTiddler)$
\end

\define tempRecord()
$(tempTable)$/$(currentRecord)$
\end

\define tempPath()
$(tempTable)$##$(currentRecord)$
\end

\define tempPathExpand()
$(tempTableExpand)$##$(currentRecord)$
\end

\define tableExpandRender()
{{$(tableExpand)$}}
\end

\define buttonIconPick()
{{$(iconPickTitle)$}}
\end

\define expandClassFilter()
[title[$(childTable)$]get[tbl-columns]]
\end

\define expandResetNested()
[title[$(childTable)$]get[tbl-page-marker]]
\end

\define editorPreview()
{{$(editorTarget)$}}
\end

\define tableFilterPick()
$(existingTableFilter)$$(existingTableFilterPrefix)$$(filterValues)$
\end

\define getIndex()
$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortType)$[title]]+[allbefore:including[$(currentRecord)$]count[]]
\end

$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/style/standar.text:
<!-- CONTAINER/TABLE-->
.{{!!tbl-class-name}} {  
  text-shadow: none;
  width:100%;
  overflow:visible;
}

.{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table{  
  text-shadow: none;
  border-collapse: collapse;
  caption-side: top;
  table-layout:auto;
  width:100%;
  margin: 0 0 0 0;
  border-top: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
  border-right: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
  border-bottom: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
  border-left: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
}

<!--CAPTION-->
.{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table > caption {
  margin: 0 0 0 0;
  padding: {{!!tbl-pad-tb-headfoot}} {{!!tbl-pad-lr}} {{!!tbl-pad-tb-headfoot}} {{!!tbl-pad-lr}};
  text-shadow: none;
  color:{{!!tbl-color-text}};
  background-color:{{!!tbl-color-caption}};
  vertical-align: middle;
  font-size: {{!!tbl-size-font}};
  line-height: {{!!tbl-size-height}};
  border-top: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
  border-right: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
  border-bottom: 0px solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
  border-left: {{!!tbl-width-border}} solid {{!!tbl-color-border}};
}

.{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table > caption *,
.{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table > caption > div *{
  margin: 0 0 0 0;
  padding: 0 0 0 0;
  text-shadow: none;
  color:{{!!tbl-color-text}};
  fill:{{!!tbl-color-text}};
}

.{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table > caption > div > .tbl-hidden-edit{
  background: transparent !important;
  border: none;
  color:{{!!tbl-color-text}}!important;
}

.{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table > caption > div > .tbl-hidden-edit-wide{
  width: 100%;
  background: transparent !important;
  border: none;
  color:{{!!tbl-color-text}}!important;
}

<!--HEADER-->
  .{{!!tbl-class-name}} > table > thead {
  text-shadow: none;
}

<$select tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-class"> <$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]has[tbl-class-name]]"> Tip: Create a new style template by cloning an existing one. Ensure field ''tbl-class-name'' exists and contains the desired name of the template. Also, ensure it is tagged with ''~$:/tags/Stylesheet''. Both are required for the template to appear in this list. <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Override"> ''Container'' (tbl-style-container) - css properties for the ``
`` element containing the table
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-style-container" tag="textarea"/> ''Table'' (tbl-style-table) - css properties for the ```` element
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-style-table" tag="textarea"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Colgroups"> ''Show Colgroup'' (tbl-show-colgroup)
<$checkbox tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-colgroup" checked="true" unchecked="false"> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-colgroup" mode="inline"/> ''Colgroup Elements'' (tbl-style-colgroup) - series of ```` elements to be included in the ```` element
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-style-colgroup" tag="textarea"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Advanced Styles"> !!Apply CSS to individual records (rowStyle):
Style can be applied to individual records using a button or checkbox. css properties should be stored in tiddler: ``<>`` in the index: ``<>``. For example, add the tbl-checkbox column to a table and set check actions to: ``` <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value="background-color:green;"/> ``` and set uncheck actions to: ``` <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index=<> $value=""/> ``` This will cause the row's background to change to green when the checkbox is checked. <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Header/Footer"> ''Show Header'' (tbl-show-header)
<$checkbox tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-header" checked="true" unchecked="false"> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-header" mode="inline"/> ''Show Footer'' (tbl-show-footer)
<$checkbox tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-footer" checked="true" unchecked="false"> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-footer" mode="inline"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Caption"> ''Show Caption'' (tbl-show-caption)
<$checkbox tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-caption" checked="true" unchecked="false"> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-caption" mode="inline"/> ''Caption'' (tbl-caption) - wikitext ({{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults!!tbl-caption-mode}})
<$edit-text tag=textarea tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-caption"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Editor"> !!!''Attention:'' This will hide the ''Edit'' button. To restore, manually set field ''tbl-show-edit'' to ''true''. ''Show Editor'' (tbl-show-edit)
<$checkbox tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-edit" checked="true" unchecked="false"> <$transclude tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-show-edit" mode="inline"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Advanced Features"> !!Defaults: Default settings can be modified here:
[[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/defaults]] Table defaults:
All default table parameters can be changed. Global defaults:
''tbl-caption-mode'' - set caption to //inline// or //block// mode.
''tbl-default-date-format'' - set default date format.
''tbl-default-title'' - set default new table name.
''tbl-temp-default-expand'' - set default expand column template.
''tbl-limit-choices'' - set drop-down values for //limit// control.
''tbl-temp-default-body'' - set the default body template for non-custom columns.
''tbl-temp-default-foot'' - set the default footer template for non-custom columns.
''tbl-temp-default-head'' - set the default header template for non-custom columns.
''tbl-title-type-code'' - code to indicate the tiddler //type// in the title column.
''tbl-title-type-show'' - show the tiddler //type// in the title column (true/false).
''text'' - filter presets (data dictionary format)
!!Useful Macro Parameters when making custom templates: can be used anywhere inside the table container:
''current table:'' ``<>``
''input filter:'' ``<>``
''processed filter:'' ``<>``
''temporary table tiddler:'' ``<>``

must be in //Header//, //Footer// or //Body// type column template:
''current column:'' ``<>``

must be in //Body// type column template:
''current record:'' ``<>``
''temporary record tiddler:'' ``<>``
''numerical record index (filter):'' ``<>`` <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Expand"> to expand one row at a time, add column: ''tbl-expand'' or ''tbl-expand-one''
to expand multiple rows, add column: ''tbl-expand-many'' ''Expand Target'' (tbl-expand) - text reference (spaces allowed, no quotes)
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-expand" size=50/> <$select tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-expand"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Button"> add column: ''tbl-button'' ''Button Icon'' (tbl-button-icon) - wikitext
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-button-icon" size=50/>

<$list filter="[titleget[tbl-button-icon]]">{{!!title}}

<$list variable="iconPickTitle" filter="[all[shadows]prefix[$:/core/images/]]"> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" actions="""<$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} tbl-button-icon=<>/>""" ><> ''Button Actions'' (tbl-button-actions) - series of action widgets
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-button-actions" tag="textarea"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Checkbox"> add column: ''tbl-checkbox'' ''Add/Remove Tag'' (tbl-checkbox-tag)
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-checkbox-tag" size=22/> ''Target Field'' (tbl-checkbox-field)
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-checkbox-field" size=22/> ''Select Value'' (tbl-checkbox-value-selected)
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-checkbox-value-selected" size=22/> ''Unselect Value'' (tbl-checkbox-value-unselected)
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-checkbox-value-unselected" size=22/> ''Select Actions'' (tbl-checkbox-actions-selected) - series of action widgets
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-checkbox-actions-selected" tag="textarea"/> ''Unselect Actions'' (tbl-checkbox-actions-unselected) - series of action widgets
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-checkbox-actions-unselected" tag="textarea"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Anything"> add column: ''tbl-anything'' ''Code'' (tbl-anything) - wikitext
<$edit-text tiddler={{$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-target}} field="tbl-anything" tag="textarea"/> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="More Columns"> !!Additional column templates:
Make column editable:
''tbl-edit'' - To use, tag [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit]] with column name.
''tbl-edit-textarea'' - To use, tag [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit-textarea]] with column name.
Add numerical index:
''ID, id'' or ''tbl-index'' - tbl-index has a hidden header. !!System fields with custom column templates:
''title'' - link to tiddler - [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/title]]
''tags'' - tag format with dropdown - [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/tags]]
''created'' - Date Format - [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/date]]
''modified'' - Date Format - [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/date]]
!!Creating new column templates:
The easiest way is to copy/modify existing templates.
__there are three types of column templates.__
*''Header Templates'' - must be tagged with ''$:/tags/table/HeaderTemplate''
*''Body Templates'' - must be tagged with ''$:/tags/table/BodyTemplate''
*''Footer Templates'' - must be tagged with ''$:/tags/table/FooterTemplate''
__There are three default column templates:__
*[[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/header/default]]
*[[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/default]]
*[[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/footer/default]]
*All fields are rendered using these default templates unless the field name is tagged to a template. *A column name should only be tagged to one template of each type: header, body and footer.
__Tagging a template gives the column a new title.__
*Allows for alternate column titles *Assigns column name to a custom template ''Example 1'': to change the label of the ''title'' column to read //Tiddler Name// instead, ''tag'' [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/title]] with "Tiddler Name" and add ``[[Tiddler Name]]`` to the table's columns instead of ``title``.
''Example 2'': to hide the title or disable sorting, ''tag'' [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/header/empty]] or [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/header/disabled]] with ''title'' and remove the tag ''title'' from [[$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/title]]. <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="Getting Started"> {{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/readme}} <$reveal type="match" state="$:/temp/tables/editor/settings-page-vars!!tbl-edit-page" text="About"> !''~TiddlyTables'' !!Version {{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables!!version}} !!!created by {{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables!!author}} last modified {{$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables!!modified}} //This plugin is free to use, modify and share. With special thanks to Jeremy Ruston and the entire ~TiddlyWiki community.//
''Show Preview''
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/temp/tables/editor/persist-vars" field="tbl-show-preview" checked="true" unchecked="false" default="false"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/temp/tables/editor/persist-vars" field="tbl-show-preview" mode="inline"/>
